source:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Mogek has need of a with a silver tongue.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
バール・レス広場のお利口のモグエクは、冒険者の話術を頼りたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_01Unable to perform the heavy lifting required to proceed with construction, the Mogmenders now turn to the dragons for aid. Mogek, however, is concerned their representative may make promises they cannot keep. He implores you to meet with them at Zenith before any rash decisions are made.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

モグエクと話した。力仕事をドラゴン族に依頼したく、その交渉を手伝ってほしいと頼んできた。白亜の宮殿にいる「交渉役のモーグリ族」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_02You are greeted by a moogle who is all smiles, telling you a deal was made just moments before your arrival. If only the dragons had interest in what was offered. Rather than the cloud mallow or kupo nuts one would expect of moogles, they demanded a number of gratuitous items that only one of your expertise could hope to craft. Supplied with materials, the moogle representative implores you to fulfill the dragons' request.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with the mediating moogle.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_02交渉役のモーグリ族と話したところ、交渉の結果、報酬があればドラゴン族は手伝いに応じてくれるそうだ。「」をもとに「」を製作し、白亜の宮殿の「新米交渉役のモーグリ族」に納品しよう。

※「」を失った場合は、交渉役のモーグリ族に話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_03<tab>You craft two masterpieces which are then offered up to appease the dragons. Satisfied with your work, they consent to lend their strength to the moogles. Return to Bahrr Lehs and inform Mogek the crisis he anticipated has been averted.
target: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_03<tab>新米交渉役のモーグリ族に<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D7701 /var>を納品した。ドラゴン族たちも、これで協力に応じてくれそうだ。バール・レス広場の「お利口のモグエク」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_04<tab>Mogek is relieved to know the dragons have agreed to help. With the Mogmenders now able to focus on the beauty of their work, he suspects the monument may turn out to be more magnificent than even your favorite moogle overseer.
target: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SEQ_04<tab>モグエクに報告した。ドラゴン族に巨大な石材を運搬してもらえれば納期も守られるはずだと安心すると同時に、ドラゴン族がいるからこそ、この雲海に壮麗な建物を建てられたのだろうと強く実感するモグエクであった。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_TODO_00<tab>Meet with the mediating moogle at Zenith.
target: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_TODO_00<tab>交渉役のモーグリ族と合流

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize the austere offerings <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>.)) ((Deliver the austere offerings <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to the helpmeet moogle.)) /var>
target: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエスト：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D7701 /var>を製作)) ((新米交渉役のモーグリ族に<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D7701 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Perfect. We are sorely in need of one with your gift for negotiation.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_000冒険者さんなら、巧みな話術を持っていると見込んで、
お願いしたいことがありますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_001<tab>With every passing day we find the stones that must be moved for construction to be larger and larger. The Mogmenders are at their wit's end, kupo! Thankfully, Whei Ahf has agreed to introduce us to dragons willing to help.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_001最近、重い石材を扱うことが増えてきたので、
ウェイ・アフさんに紹介してもらったドラゴンさんに、
お手伝いを頼んでいるところなのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_002<tab>That is, of course, if we can agree on proper payment. There is little we can offer at present, and the Mogmenders are like to be intimidated by the dragons' imposing presence. We need someone who can look them in the eye and strike a fair deal.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_002……その大事な交渉を、
冒険者さんに手伝っていただきたいのですくぽ！
モグたちの仲間が、すでに交渉に向かいましたくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_003<tab>No doubt they're at Zenith discussing terms even as we speak. Please hurry, before we're up to our poms in debt, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_003「白亜の宮殿」で、ドラゴンさんと交渉しているはずですくぽ。
なんとか協力を取り付けてほしいので、
よろしくお願いしますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_010<tab>Oh, I wasn't expecting Mogek to send anyone. No need to worry, though. A pact has been made, and the dragons will soon be ready to work, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_010冒険者さんも来てくれたくぽ？
安心してほしいくぽ、このモグさまが見事に交渉を済ませたくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_011<tab>Except, well...they have no interest in what we had to offer.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_011……ただ、ちょっぴり困ったことがあるくぽ。
お礼の品として、モグが用意していた報酬はいらないから、
別のものが欲しいと言われてしまったくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_013<tab>Instead, they ask for metal covers fitted for their claws, kupo! They say their claws are chipped, and must be kept safe until they regrow.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_013なんでも、この前、鋭い爪が欠けてしまったそうくぽ。
だから、その代わりになる「金属の爪」が欲しいらしいくぽ……。
冒険者さん、作ってくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_014<tab>Instead, they ask for nests of sorts made of soft materials, that they may rest easy whenever they come to Zenith.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_014なんでも、翼を休める場所を、もっと快適にしたいそうくぽ。
だから、やわらか～い台座が欲しいらしいくぽ……。
冒険者さん、作ってくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_015<tab>Instead, they ask for ointments to heal their wounds. Though dragons are wont to sleep when injured, they wish to experience the healing arts of man.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_015なんでも、最近、古傷がズキズキ痛むそうくぽ。
だから、ヒトが薬草を使って作る、軟膏が欲しいそうくぽ。
冒険者さん、作ってくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_016<tab>I fear none of us have the skill to produce goods suitable to their high standards. I know this is sudden, but we could really use your help, kupo! When you've crafted the offerings, take them to my assistant.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_016材料なら、モグがたんまり持ってるから安心するくぽ。
作成できたら、新米交渉役のモーグリ族に渡してあげてくぽ～。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_017<tab>If you're running low on materials, just say the word and I'll track down more. Don't take too long, though. My assistant can only placate the dragons for so long, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_017材料なら、モグがたんまり持ってるから安心するくぽ。
作成できたら、「新米交渉役のモーグリ族」に渡してあげてくぽ～。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_018<tab>That was fast, kupo! And not a moment too soon. The dragons are growing restless. Take them the offerings, quickly!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_018もう作成できてるようくぽ！
善は急げくぽ、「新米交渉役のモーグリ族」に渡してあげてくぽ～。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_000_019<tab>If you would kindly wait just a short while longer, we have our very best moogles working to prepare your payment.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_000_019集まってくれてありがとうくぽ～！
報酬は鋭意準備中なので、もう少しお待ちくださいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONA02303_000_020<tab>Such puny creatures. These massive stones you speak of are but pebbles to us.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONA02303_000_020お前たちにとっては重い石材でも、
俺たちからしたら、綿毛のようなものさ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONB02303_000_021<tab>The pact has been made, moogle. If you cannot provide what was agreed upon, then we will take our leave.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONB02303_000_021モーグリとの盟約は結ばれた。
要求した報酬と引き換えならば、我らの力を貸そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_000_030<tab>Oh, thank goodness. A <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var>. The day may yet be saved, kupo! Please tell me you have what the dragons have demanded of us.
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_000_031<tab>Yes, yes, I am sure they will be most pleased.
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_100_031<tab>O mighty dragons, I humbly offer this as payment for your services. I hope it meets with your expectations.
target: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_100_031<tab>みなさん、こちらが報酬品ですくぽ～！！

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONA02303_000_032<tab>Hmmm... Well done. Perhaps there is merit in working with you moogles after all.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONA02303_000_032確かに見事な出来栄えだ……。
協力の求めに応じた甲斐があったというものだな。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONB02303_000_033<tab>You have honored the pact, and so we shall do the same. Our strength is yours.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_PARTTIMEDRAGONB02303_000_033うむ、要求どおりの品である。
ならば、盟約にしたがい、この力を貸そうではないか！

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_000_034<tab>Phew. I shudder to think what would've happened if they didn't approve. Thanks, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEB02303_000_034ドラゴン族に報酬品を気に入ってもらえてよかったくぽ！
作ってくれて、どうもありがとうくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_035<tab>I daresay we wouldn't be able to finish the plaza without them. With the dragons handling the heavy lifting, things should move along much more smoothly, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_NEGOTIATEMOOGLEA02303_000_035ドラゴン族たちが協力してくれるお陰で、
モグたちの作業も、すこぶる捗るに違いないくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_040<tab>The Mogmenders tell me a certain someone's help was vital in negotiating with the dragons. Naturally, I assumed they meant yours truly. Imagine my embarrassment when I remembered I'd sent you on that errand! Well done, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_040交渉を手伝ってくれて、どうもありがとうございますくぽ。
お手伝いに来てくれたドラゴンさんのおかげで、
納期もバッチリ守られますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_041<tab>I really cannot thank you enough. Do you have any idea how many moogles it would take to carry even one of those boulders? Neither do I. Just trying to imagine it leaves me exhausted.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_041もしドラゴン族がいなかったら、石材を運ぶだけでも、
物凄い時間と手間がかかるはずですくぽ。
想像しただけで疲れてしまいますくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_042<tab>But with dragons handling the more strenuous labor, the Mogmenders can give more attention to detail. I daresay the monument may even turn out more marvelous than me, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_MOGEK_000_042ドラゴン族がいるからこそ、
この雲海に、こんなに壮麗な建物を建てられたのだと、
修復団いち賢いモグも、強く実感しますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG402_02303_SYSTEM_000_043本クエストで製作した「NQアイテム」を所持しています。
このアイテムは、使用することはありません。
売却もできませんので、不用でしたら破棄してください。
